summary.actual_execution_platforms: Multi-platform validation: Local CPU (India), Google Colab T4 GPU (US-West), Kaggle CPU (US-Central)
key_strategies: Multi-platform testing - validated on Local CPU, Google Colab T4 GPU, and Kaggle CPU
Regional selection analysis - identified 37.5% potential savings (US-West vs India)
Time-based scheduling analysis - identified 38.2% potential savings with off-peak
Hardware comparison - GPU 40% faster but CPU 50% more energy efficient
Model architecture optimization via NAS - achieved 43.8% parameter reduction
Combined spatiotemporal optimization - 51.4% potential savings demonstrated

limitations: Multi-platform testing validated methodology, but production deployment may vary

Network transfer costs not included in analysis

Regional availability and latency constraints tested on cloud platforms (Colab, Kaggle)
Competition deadline required parallel testing vs sequential optimization
